ygData.subject: Re: Pelts and Tailoring
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/22/99 4:05:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time, EQCheats@onelist.com writes:  This is very untrue unless
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/22/99 4:05:04 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
EQCheats@onelist.com writes:

<< << most kills yield up ruined pelts. >>

This is very untrue unless you are speaking of low level animals. If you
want medium quality cat pelts (for Studded) You kill Pumas in East Commons
along the desert wall. If you want high quality cat pelts (for Reinforced)
You kill Lions (especially Patriarch and Matriarch) in the Karanas. As far as
I know Patriarch and matriach are most commonly found in Eastern Karana along
the path. Also for low quality cat pelts are sometimes found on Pumas, as are
high quality. >>


This is all well and good for medium wearers. And it is fairly well
known that the other Karanas yield decent LQ, MQ, and HQ Bear pelts for the
larger types (as well as the Kodiaks to the East). However, with several
hundred puppies that have gotten their noses whacked I find no good source of
LQ, MQ, or HQ pelts for small sizes.
And while on the subject, any use for LQ pelts besides resale for
coin? Tailors use MQ (studded) and HQ (Reinforced, which last I heard wasn't
working). LQ uses?
